title: PC_Maximum G Force Coasters-.direct.play.request.-ToeD
description:
The One Eyed Dude 

    delivers you with

==>  Maximum G-Force Coasters! -.direct.play.- <== 

=-> ripped: nothing <-===-> added: experience  <-=



<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->
Requested and now... Dream it, Build it, Ride it

If you&#039;re an adrenaline junkie and crave the rush of high-speed thrills, 
start building! Construct Wooden, Steel, Inverted, even Stand-Up and 
Flying coasters that push the boundaries of design with gravity-defying
loops, stomach-wrenching corkscrews and knee-weakening speeds!. 
Then hop in and hang on for a HEART-POUNDING RIDE!

CREATE 7 TYPES OF COASTERS:
Stand Up - Floorless Steel - Inverted - Steel Freeform
Wooden - Mouse - Suspended Flying

CREATE 10 TYPES OF INVERSIONS:
Heartline - Heartline Loops - Cutback - Camel Backs - Cobras
Pretzel Loops - Corkscrews - Incline Loops - Batwings - Helix

* Ride your own creations from any seat or car!
* Beat the 20+ mission challenges building your coasters within budget 
and design parameters, or free build any coaster you like.
* Down, Down, Underground!
Add special tunnels that dive through the landscape.
* Your coaster, Your style! Customize your creation with your choice of
 decals and colors.
* Explore the amazing 3D environments from 5 camera views.
* Easy-to-use 3D editor with advanced snap technology



<->( Hardware Requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

enuff




<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: MaxiCoast.exe ( must be done, once! )

3.: run game with desktop icon!.




<->( general hints )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Trojan/Virus is a bold word to use without proof, you should NEVER

think twice about.


read everything carefuly, especially the following below ...
 

<->( Special Info )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed .exe file , in this

case its the file > MaxiCoast.exe < as a lame virus, because its  

the byte by byte check error of some virustools!. ( h e u r i s t i c s  ) but... 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics,

you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics). you can also upload the file to certain websites to let them test.

with this result...> a false positive alert from... < if you dont believe , then

simply stay away, and dont come up with nonsense. thank you for reading!. 



 in every life we have some trouble and when you worry you make it double!




Greets to the deserving...
